# <h1 align="center">The Maze Game</h1>
## <h2 align="center">A simple Maze Game made using JavaFX</h2>

### I'm using recursive back tracking to generate maze paths.

* #### You can find 2D visualizing [here](https://github.com/heshanthenura/The-Maze-Game/tree/master/MazeVisualize)
* #### You can find Test file here [here](https://github.com/heshanthenura/The-Maze-Game/blob/master/src/test/java/MazeTest.java)
